br.com.caelum.vraptor.validator.beanvalidation

Class BeanValidatorContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.caelum.vraptor.validator.beanvalidation.BeanValidatorContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.validation.MessageInterpolator.Context

    public class BeanValidatorContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.validation.MessageInterpolator.Context
    Create a personalized implementation for MessageInterpolator.Context. This class is need to interpolate the constraint violation message with localized messages.
